name: Healthbox
tag_list: healthcare, healthcare-startups, accelerator, business-accelerator, incubator, business-incubator
overview:
Healthbox is one of the first business accelerator programs in the healthcare industry, providing a platform to stimulate and support innovation among high-potential, seed-stage entrepreneurs.

With support from a number of significant players in healthcare, Healthbox is bringing together other leading healthcare investors, along with industry and business experts, to form a dynamic hub of entrepreneurship with unrivaled exposure and access to the healthcare market.

The program will identify healthcare technology and technology-enabled services startups from across the country to be part of a dynamic growth accelerator program. Our focus is to find companies that have the potential to grow – either new companies already starting to serve the market, or entrepreneurs with creative solutions who need help formalizing their business models.

Through a competitive application process, ten entrepreneurs/teams will be selected to participate in a three-month accelerator program in Chicago. During the course of the three months, each company will be expected to develop a work plan and make meaningful progress on key milestones by leveraging the program’s resources. Ultimately, each company will have the opportunity to form new partnerships, find beta customers and raise additional capital through the program’s network.

At the end of the three-month program, angel and venture investors from around the country will be invited to an event where each entrepreneurial team will give their pitch for funding. The day will also provide the opportunity for broader informal networking and learning from guest speakers.
